-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/benweitzman/yael#readme</a>
@package yael-http
@version 0.1.0.0

module Yael.Eff.HTTP
data ResponseBody m
ResponseComplete :: ByteString -> ResponseBody m
ResponseChunked :: m ByteString -> ResponseBody m
hoistResponseBody :: (m ~> n) -> ResponseBody m -> ResponseBody n
data HTTP m
HTTP :: (forall a. Request -> (Response (ResponseBody m) -> m a) -> m a) -> HTTP m
[_withResponse] :: HTTP m -> forall a. Request -> (Response (ResponseBody m) -> m a) -> m a
managerHTTP :: MonadBaseControl IO m => Manager -> HTTP m
mockHTTP :: (Request -> Response ByteString) -> HTTP m
staticHTTP :: Map (Method, ByteString) (Status, ByteString) -> HTTP m
request :: HasEff HTTP f m => Request -> EffT f m (Response ByteString)
withResponse :: HasEff HTTP f m => Request -> (Response (ResponseBody (EffT f m)) -> EffT f m a) -> EffT f m a
brReadAll :: Monad m => ResponseBody m -> m ByteString
brConsume :: Monad m => m ByteString -> m [ByteString]
